Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flight management system database corruption. Anomaly detected during routine
inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 22/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
